Text: Oddur Sigurðsson, a glaciologist at the Icelandic Meteorological Office, forecasts that all of Iceland's 300 or so named glaciers will melt within 200 years, raising global sea levels by 1 centimeter (0.4 of an inch).
Cause: Oddur Sigurðsson, a glaciologist at the Icelandic Meteorological Office, forecasts that all of Iceland's 300 or so named glaciers will melt within 200 years
Effect: raising global sea levels by 1 centimeter (0.4 of an inch).
Sentence: <e1>Oddur Sigurðsson, a glaciologist at the Icelandic Meteorological Office, forecasts that all of Iceland's 300 or so named glaciers will melt within 200 years</e1>, <e2>raising global sea levels by 1 centimeter (0.4 of an inch).</e2>
